FRS_Method: GPS CARRIER PHASE STATIC RELATIVE POSITION

_exec_summary.SummaryText:
OUR COMPANY IS AN AGRICULTURAL RETAIL BUSINESS THAT SPECIALIZES IN GRAIN STORAGE FOR AREA PRODUCERS.   THIS COMPANY STRIVES TO MAINTAIN A SAFE AND HEALTHY WORK PLACE.  OUR FARMER OWNERS, AND MANAGERS  HAVE MADE EVERY EFFORT TO PLAN THE PREVENTION OF ANY ACCIDENTAL RELEASE OF ANHYDROUS AMMONIA.

THIS COMPANY MAINTAINS THE NH3 PLANT IN STRICT ACCORDANCE WITH ALL FEDERAL, STATE AND LOCAL AUTHORITIES.  THE KANSAS  DEPARTMENT OF AGRICULTURE INSPECTS OUR PLANT ON A REGULAR BASIS AND WE COMPLY WITH THEIR REQUEST FOR IMPROVEMENT.  THOSE CHANGES OR IMPROVEMENTS WILL BE ACTED UPON IMMEDIATELY TO REDUCE POTENTIAL AMMONIA RELEASES.  THIS PLANT HAS EMERGENCY SHUT OFF VALVES, BACK CHECK VALVES, BREAK AWAYS, AND EXCESS FLOW VALVES IN PLACE AT THIS TIME.

THE WORST CASE AND ALTERNATE RELEASE SCENARIOS HAVE BEEN EVALUATED AND WILL BE SHARED WITH OUR FIRST RESPONDERS AS PART OF AN ON-GOING TRAINING PROGRAM.  MORE IMPORTANTLY, OUR EMPLOYEES HAVE BEEN TRAINED IN THEIR RESPECTIVE EMERGENCY ACTIONS, INCLUDING THE EMERGENCY MEETING PLACE AND EACH OF THEIR RESPONSIBILITIES REGARDING AN ACCIDENTAL RELEASE OF ANHYDROUS AMMONIA.
                                         
OUR COMPANY HAS RECENTLY PURCHASED THIS FACILITY FROM A COMPANY THAT HAD AN EXCELLENT PROGRAM IN PLACE.  WE WILL MONITOR ANY OPERATION TO MAKE SURE IT MAINTAINS A COMPREHENSIVE OPERATING, MAINTENANCE, AND TRAINING PROGRAM DESIGNED TO PROTECT THE COMMUNITY AND EMPLOYEES ALIIKE.

WITH THE ABOVE MENTIONED PROGRAM IN MIND, IT IS EASY TO REPORT TO YOU THAT  NO INJURY, ACCIDENTS, OR PROPERTY DAMAGE HAVE OCCURRED AT THIS FACILITY IN THE PAST FIVE YEARS.

THIS COMPANY WILL PROVIDE A  PLANT TOUR FOR OUR LOCAL FIRE DEPARTMENT AND OUR PLAN WILL BE SHARED WITH THE COUNTY LOCAL EMERGENCY PLANNING COMMISSION (LEPC).  THEY ARE AWARE OF THE DANGEROUS NATURE OF NH3 AND THEY HAVE AGREED TO ASSIST US IN THE EVENT OF AN EMERGENCY.
